author: Tessa B
comment: As a teacher this is invaluable. I always know exactly how long I have till class ends. It is perfect for making sure I get exit slips out in time and get cleanup taken care of. The developer responds quickly (Thank you) and I was able to find my notifications had been blocked on my watch somehow. If the watch could vibrate with the alerts like the phone at the time left that would be fantastic. Or if you could make a new schedule based off your old one easier for those odd days. Would make the app fantastic.  This app is a must have for Teachers, and I have recommended it to several already. Thanks again!

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Thank you for your review. :) You can make a new schedule based on another one. Use the "share" button and select a place to save your timetable, like Google Drive. Then open that timetable and select Class Time. Opening always creates a new copy, so you will have two copies in the app. You can then edit the copy as you wish. Hope that helps.

author: Rhythm Rice
comment: I wish it had a complication for wear 2.0 so i could always see how much time is left without needing a constant notification taking up my whole watch

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Good suggestion

comment: Useless without some modifications.  It will not allow the naming of  schedules.  It will not allow more than 5 periods.  For my use as a teacher, and for the High School schedules where I work, it is useless, despite its many options.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: You can name schedules in the settings, you can also have as many schedules as you want, with as many lessons of any length as you want. Other teachers find it useful, what is the problem you are  facing? You can also email me at classtimecontact@nohus.eu and I will try helping you. : )

author: Andykeyboard boc
comment: Perfect app.. but problems with notification in miui... is that possible to add transparent backgroung for notification?? (i have bought notification color and widget) and can you add a widget color setting??

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Thank you, I'll look into the transparent background with the next update.

author: Averri Graham
comment: It is very useful in keeping an eye on my class schedule, with a good amount of detail. The app creators are also very helpful, responding almost immediately if any issues are encountered.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: I'm sorry to hear that. In what way isn't it working exactly? You can also send me an email at classtimecontact@nohus.eu so we can work this out. : )

author: Abhilash Behera
comment: Thank you very much for solving my issues. I am therefore increasing the rating from 2 to 5. Good job developers

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: This can happen if you have some "battery optimization" apps or the app is otherwise killed. You need to whitelist Class Time in that case. Hope this helps.

author: DJ Martin
comment: Great app but 2 small issues. I have to open the app every morning for it to open the notification. And the swap timetables by week feature has not been working for me.

author: Cherilyn Kynaston
comment: No audible notification. For me, it is an unusable app.

author: Nikhil Gupta
comment: The widget doesn't regularly update how much time is left in the break, etc. Except for that, great app.

author: Ethan Parker
comment: This one app makes my entire school life easier especially with my Android Wear watch!

author: Magda
comment: This app changed my life because now I remember about my classes thanks!!!!

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: I'm glad you like it. : )

author: Sinnerman
comment: Really useful

author: Angelina D. Ruggiero
comment: This is my most useful app! As a college student, business owner and a mom, my time is limited! But the visual aid of this app that works with my watch is amazing! I love that it tells me how long I’ll be in class, how long my break is and where I need to be!! I just wish you could access it from the desktop AND I wish it would display todays date.
As a teacher this is fantastic, however it would be great if I could get my android wear to vibrate 50% through lesson, 10 mins to go etc. is this not possible? I can only get it to work on my phone.

author: Steven Ortiz
comment: the new update now fixed the issue of android wear 2.0 that I had. Thanks

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Issues with Android Wear 2.0 should be fixed in the next release. Hold tight. : )

author: Abdulaziz Yaslam
comment: As a college student, this app is a lifesaver. At the beginning of every term, I can see everyone checking their schedules online or writing them down in their notebooks, trying to find what class they have and where. I, on the other hand, just check my smartwatch.   Class Time's watch face tells you what class you have, where, what your next class is, and how much time you have left until the lecture/break ends. This app is currently dictating my next smartwatch purchase as it is currently only available on Android Wear.  There are plenty of settings to mess around with, from auto-muting, to vibration patterns that notify you of how much time you have left. Honestly, this app can be used as a day organizer or for a workout schedule.  The only thing I could wish for is the ability to copy lessons and paste them wherever I wish. Currently, you have to be smart about the way you add classes so that you can use the 'copy day' feature as a shortcut.

author: Abdul Rauf Chowdary
comment: I purchased this app, but its widget is not working. The widget won't change to next class automatically. I have to restart the app again. Please rectify it.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: I am sorry to hear that, please e-mail me and we will try to resolve that or give you a refund.

author: Tony Bambino
comment: This app got me through 2 semesters, however I would like Tizen support since my Samsung Gear S3 doesn't have Android Wear.

author: Turbo Taquito [Google]
comment: Please add support for Tizen (Samsung Gear). Even if you don't have a lot of free time, it would be awesome if you could make it work! Otherwise this app is useless for me

author: Bianca S
comment: I love this app! I am a teacher and this is my life line. I really hope you make a samsung gear version. Otherwise I will need to return my new smart watch, that is how much I love this app!

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Thank you. I am a student and unfortunately I don't have enough free time to develop another smartwatch app version, sorry. I will keep supporting the Android Wear version.

author: vicky kashyap
comment: I was earlier having a problem as I haven't discovered this awesome app fully. I commented here and got reply within a day. Thanks for the Service.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: I'm glad I could help. : )

author: Siddhant Bhargava
comment: Incredible app. I am a school student and this is just perfect. It does exactly as described and works well with my Huawei Watch 2.

author: TexasPizza
comment: Amazing for organizing my classes, currently in using it in high school but I'll be sure to use this in college too.

author: Janzen Bosco
comment: This needs a holiday mode to stop it when there is no school for that day or week.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Just switch to an empty plan, you can even name it "holiday". To stop the notification for a single day, you have that option in the menu. : )

author: 陈通昱
comment: I love the fonction of vibration. Looking foward to the IOS version

author: Kamil Poniatowski
comment: Very nice app, now everything works.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Thanks for the report, it will be fixed soon.

author: Cat Hoare
comment: Love this but how do I cancel classes?

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: You have the option to cancel the classes for today in the three dots menu. Hope this helps. : )

author: Kevin Mark
comment: I was sitting in class a few days ago thinking, quite literally, "If only I could easily see how much more of this I had to endure." Class Time does this perfectly. It's completely out of the way when I have no use for it and right where it's needed when I do. There are a few minor UI issues but nothing more than occasional annoyances that can be worked around. Importing classes directly from Google Calendar (where I already had them stored) was flawless and only took a few seconds. A glorious job by Nohus.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: I'm glad you like it. : ) Could you e-mail me what are that minor UI issues so I can fix them?

author: Charlotte Yates
comment: Nice but painful to input every lesson. Can you export to Google as I'm due a phone upgrade and don't want to restart the process again. Also add holidays

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: You can import the plan from your Google calendar, you can also share your plan, if you have a file manager your will be able to select it to save the plan to a file, so you can open it on another phone later. To create a holiday, just create a new empty plan, you can name it "holiday", you can then switch with a single tap. : )

author: Deepanshu Hardaha
comment: Unlock Feature is not working.Plz fix it.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Working on it, thanks for the report. : )

author: Pankaj K Siddharth
comment: App purchase shouldn't be there

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Please update the app, you are on an older version that contains a bug which was already fixed.

author: Skylar Wolf
comment: I love that I can just look at my watch to see how much time is left in class. I also love that it has a time correction setting, because the school's clock is off by one minute. Only thing I would want to see added are temporary tables, for special days.
title: Very recommend for students, especially those with smart watches.

author: Adrian Borup
comment: I use this constantly for school, and it works great! Also I don't regret my purchase of colour selection at all, it's awesome and I want to support this app. Though I do have a few minor complaints. When I don't specify the location of the class, I'd like it to not show "in" in the 'next' section. Also being able to change colours on android wear would be nice!
title: Really good app!

author: Kimberly Conner
comment: This app is almost perfect for substitute teaching at multiple schools. It allows you to create more than one timetable, so you can easily switch between schools. It is also very sleek looking in its design. I would only change 3 things:  1) Allow more customization of alerts, such as alert times & having a bell ring (two of my schools don't have bells, so I rely on this app to tell me the period is ending/beginning), 2) alphabetize the timetable list, and 3) remove the "in" from the "Next" bar. Thanks!
title: Perfect for Substitutes

author: michael booker jr
comment: I use this  for school, and it works great but not all the times. And  when I try to import info from my Google calendar it screwed it up were I didn’t understand it. And I thing its dumb that you have to pay for colors. It's very useful for when you're arranging a schedule .to tell you the truth be told didn’t really need this because I got google calendar to do the same thing but my teacher said we had to use it. They had very similar ways between the two apps too. But I do like that you can donate a bus ticket or a small pizza and a movie ticket I don't know what its goes to but and the bottom it say 'google takes 30% of every donation and purchases. But the app is good.

author: Hariharan Velu
comment: Most of the college not following mon,Tue.... Following day order method.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: You are the first person to say that since the app was released 2 years ago, what is the day order at your college?

title: Need Day order-Must have feature

author: Lou Moison
comment: Everything works untill I try to change the watch face through the settings. My watch goes black and when I tap the reset button it shows the time and stuff but it is on the sides of the screen with nothing in the middle. I'm using a LG g4 with a moto 360 2nd gen. Would love to be able to change some settings
title: Please fix

author: Oscar Ojeda Gomez
comment: Times are all messed up when I try to import data from my Google calendar. App seems nice, too bad it won't properly sync.
title: Import doesn't work properly

author: Sam Scott
comment: Extremely good. Used it all through high school and it's never let me down. Smartwatch support and active developers makes this the best app out there for this.
title: Great

author: Riyaan Bakhda
comment: I use it everyday.  However, just a suggestion you should be able to add breaks.

reply.author: Nohus
reply.content: Thank you. If you want to add more information to your breaks, just add them as lessons with an appropriate name.

title: Great app. Use it everyday. One suggestion though...
